title: Rebellion
description: WITH LUCIFER'S ARMY HUNTING THE BOOK-BEARERS, THERE'S NOWHERE TO HIDE.  Smoke rises from the ruins of fallen kingdoms. Forgotten secrets have been revealed. In the darkness of the world, Lucifer's army grows.The quest of the book-bearers grows even more perilous when Isaac and his companions discover that ancient enemies have risen from the Heart of Elysium, seeking to snatch the Book of Letters from their hands. The Nephilins are now aided by Xavier, one of the Fallen Rulers. Villages have been brought to the ground by armies of Shadows. Creatures from the Abyss now lurk in the mountains and forests, longing to kill whoever crosses their path. Isaac and his companions must find courage to overcome their fears as they continue their journey throughout Elysium.  "Rebellion was a fast paced, thrilling read that leaves you thirsting for more. This dark world will take you on a journey you will never forget." — Benjamin Alderson, Author of Cloaked in Shadow ★★★★★  "Rebellion did not disappoint me at all!" — Darque Dreamer, Goodreads Reviewer ★★★★★  "I can't wait to see what happens next!" — Brianna, Goodreads Reviewer ★★★★★
author: J.D. Netto
